rukus.text: And We have certainly revealed to Moses that travel by night with My servants, and make a dry path for them in the sea, and do not be afraid of being overtaken (by Pharaoh) and do not fear (from drowning in the sea)
So Pharaoh followed them with his troops, then the sea covered them with what covered them (and they drowned)
And Pharaoh misguided his people and he did not guide

Children of Israel, We have saved you from your enemy, and We made an appointment with you on the right side of the mountain (Mount Sinai), and We sent down Manna and Salwa (two kind of edible foods) to you
Eat from good things that We provided you and do not rebel in it, otherwise My anger comes downs upon you, and anyone whom My anger comes down upon him, then he has fallen down
And indeed I am very forgiving to anyone who repents and believes and does good works, and then stays rightly guided
and Moses, what made you rush ahead of your people
He said: they are close on my tracks, and I rushed to You to please You my Master
He (God) said: indeed We have tested your people after you, and the Sumeri misguided them

So Moses returned to his people, angry and sorrowful. He said: my people, did not your Master promise you a good promise, was the promise too long for you or did you want the anger of your Master to come down upon you that you broke (your) promise to me
They said: we did not break (our) promise to you on purpose, but we were made to carry a load of ornament from (Pharaohâ€™s) people, so we threw it (into fire) same as the Sumeri threw
Then he brought out (of the fire) a body of a calf for them which had a sound, so they said: this is your god and god of Moses, but he (Moses) forgot
Do they not see that it does not respond to them a word, and it does not have power of any harm or any benefit for them
